title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - iTTi's Cross-Company Data Mesh Blueprint with Amazon SageMaker (ANT342)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - iTTi的跨公司数据网格蓝图与Amazon SageMaker (ANT342)
abstract: This session shares the journey of implementing a hybrid Data Mesh architecture within a multi-company holding, balancing centralization and decentralization needs. We will cover how our hybrid approach leverages Amazon EMR on EKS for data lake ingestion and Amazon SageMaker to enable self-service data discovery, data product subscription, and consumption, allowing companies within the group to autonomously explore, access, and utilize data products while maintaining centralized governance. Through ITTI - Grupo Vázquez's real-world experience, attendees will learn how this hybrid data mesh architecture successfully addresses diverse data domains, varying governance requirements, and rapid value delivery needs.
abstract_cn: 本次会议分享了在多公司控股集团内实施混合数据网格架构的历程，平衡了集中化和去中心化的需求。我们将介绍混合方法如何利用 Amazon EMR on EKS 进行数据湖摄取，以及如何使用 Amazon SageMaker 实现自助式数据发现、数据产品订阅和消费，使集团内的公司能够自主探索、访问和利用数据产品，同时保持集中化治理。通过 ITTI - Grupo Vázquez 的实际经验，与会者将了解这种混合数据网格架构如何成功应对多样化的数据域、不同的治理要求以及快速价值交付需求。
